name: sbimvOLD
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))

stmt.origin: impbii(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wi(wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wi(wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wi(wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

body.origin: |- wi(wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Obsolete version of ~ sbim as of 24-Jul-2023. Substitution distributes over implication. Version of ~ sbim with a disjoint variable condition, not requiring ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 18-Jan-2023.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
